title: APP Stand Up Paddle Board
overview: CBS Sports will be airing portions of the APP Stand Up Paddle Board world tour in 2017. After an epic start to the 2017 season at Sunset Beach last week, the APP World Tour is proud to announce the kick off to its partnership with CBS Sports Network this week with a series of airings of its 2016 Show series. As part of a multi year deal that will air all Shows from the 2017 season as well, CBS Sports Network has been positioned as the US broadcast partner for the APP World Tour.
